ygData.subject: Re: Skill Level Formulas **Spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: Combat skills max at 3*(lvl+1) for Pure casters, 4* for clerical types, and 5* for combat types.  Offense and defense both seem to max at 5*lvl, Fishing is
ygData.messageBody:
Combat skills max at 3*(lvl+1) for Pure casters, 4* for clerical types, and
5* for combat types. Offense and defense both seem to max at 5*lvl, Fishing
is capped along with all other non trade skillx, although it was not in beta
until near the end.
----- Original Message -----
From: Karl Hatteland <karlh@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 10:15 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Skill Level Formulas **Spoiler**


> From: "Karl Hatteland" <karlh@...>
>
> Fishing does not have cap
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael C. Haferkamp <haferkam@...>
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, May 03, 1999 11:48 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Skill Level Formulas **Spoiler**
>
>
> >From: "Michael C. Haferkamp" <haferkam@...>
> >
> >I am a Starfall, a 4th lvl WIZ on the Rallos Zek server. I spent the
time
> >to MAX ALL of my non-trade skills at every level. The proper formulas are
> >listed below.
> >
> > Combat Skills ( MAX= ((lvl+1)*5) )
> > (Hand-to-Hand,Piercing, Throwing, 1-H Blunt, 2-H Blunt)
> > Defense ( MAX= (lvl*5) )
> > Offence ( MAX= (lvl*4) )
> > All Other Non-Trade Skills ( MAX= ((lvl+1)*5) )
> > Bind Wound, Beg, Alcohol Tolerance, Sense Heading, Swimming,
etc...
> >
> > I have not had the money to work on any trade skills other than
Fishing
> >or the occasional Baking and Tailoring. The Fishing skill seems to Max
at
> >((lvl+1)*5).
> >
> >
> >
